data.title: RocknRolla Script at IMSDb.
data.meta_description: RocknRolla script at the Internet Movie Script Database.
data.text:
MerrittTheFerret (5 out of 10 )

Well, ten stars for the script, but one star for the movie that got made. Funny story, I saw this movie in theaters with three good friends of mine, I had recently gotten a gift-card for the movie theater and I asked everybody if they wanted to go see a movie. We all decided "RockNRolla" looked like the best movie they were showing and soon we were in the theater, watching it. Two and a half hours later, we all walked out saying "WTF?" But in the end, we had a pretty good time, even if the movie was pretty horrible.

Eddy (10 out of 10 )

WOW- The movie was poor? ETTO I suppose, would be a boring world if we all liked the same things. Personally I thought it was brilliant, so many good characters and its the type of film that can be watched over and over.

Frank (5 out of 10 )

If rock and rolla is poor then there is not much that can interest you I reckon.

Rolaball (10 out of 10 )

Amazing film, brilliant dialogue, brilliant acting. Second favourite film after Pulp Fiction. The characters are excellent and the plot is great. Ritchie done a great job of directing, if you came out from watching this thinking what then I would love to know how the hell you got your head around Inception. Can't wait for the next 2 films in the series bring it on.

Cameron (10 out of 10 )

Rocknrolla is a hilarious crime comedy with, of course, a lot of rock music, hence the name.

Leandro (10 out of 10 )

Guy Ritchie at his finest. One of the best crime movies made in England that we can watch.
